Description: Death by ... (e.g., if you asked for Olives then this is Death by Olives)
Transformation into another creature, object, or manifestation of your worst fear (e.g., if you asked for Olive then this makes you a talking olive tree)
Loss of related body parts (e.g., if you asked to see something then your eyes may disappear)
Complete loss of related senses (e.g., inability to smell, poor hearing, clouded vision: you asked for olives but now you can't distinguish olives from grapes)
Loss of an entire skill in a related area (e.g., permanent brain fog giving you disadvantage on survival checks or inability to read or speak a language you knew)
You develop a dangerous allergy to whatever you desired (e.g., you are now allergic to even the scent of olives)
Loss of all memories relating to your goal (e.g., you asked for Olives but now you can't recall what an olive is or why you would ever want one)
Loss of any related equipment or information (e.g., loss of all maps, keys, and clues)
Forgetting your request (e.g., 'I asked for something?')
Absolutely nothing happens
You have a vision, insight, or feeling that may help achieve your goal
You find a helpful item that will continually assist you in achieving your goal
Permanent advantage on checks towards achieving your goal
A magical item that helps you with your goal (e.g., if you asked for olives, this would give you a compass that points to olive trees)
You can advantage on all checks related to this goal (e.g., if you asked for olives, this would give you a advantage looking for one)
You can a sixth sense or a spirit guide to help you achieve your goal
You get a small preview of what you asked for (eg. if you asked for olives, this would give you seeds)
You get part of what you asked
This is 90% of what you asked for but with one small flaw that could come back to haunt you later
You get all of what you asked for.
